title: Recover PIN on a 3a
content:
Pixel 3a delivered yesterday, I set up the phone and the PIN worked fine. Today I setup fingerprint, phone worked fine, restarted phone, now the PIN doesn't work.
    This is a known issue "bug" according to the community, is Google support working on a fix or should I just return the phone.
   I'm NOT going to "FACTORY RESET" every time I restart. Is this an issue with ALL Pixel phones?

Thanks in advance to those who respond.....Jeff
